help.scoreInfoModalContent:
The AI scores your CV based on clarity, impact, and formatting.

85-100 (Strong): Excellent! Your CV is well-structured and impactful.

60-84 (Good): A solid CV with some room for improvement. Focus on the suggestions.

0-59 (Needs Work): Your CV needs significant revisions. Follow the feedback carefully.
